name: Answering Machine Detection
description: Detect when a call goes to voicemail

HOSTNAME.description: Server URL for application. Do not include `https`

NEXMO_PRIVATE_KEY_PATH.description: Path to Nexmo Application private key

NEXMO_NUMBER.description: The Nexmo number associated with the Nexmo application

CLOUD_STORAGE_BUCKET.description: Google Cloud bucket name. Used to save recordings (Optional)

PROJECT_ID.description: Google Cloud Project ID. Used to save recordings (Optional)
